title: The Most Disturbing Story I’ve Ever Heard (Ep 1637)
description:
In this episode I address the troubling story I’ve ever heard. It revolves around immigration. 

News Picks:

There were massive failings in the 2020 election. 

Florida’s path from worst to first on covid numbers.


The Lancet vaccine-study discussed in the show today. 


A stunning new poll about the Virginia Governor’s race.

We’ve seen the hysteria and misinformation campaign surrounding covid before.


The McAuliffe campaign wanted to “kill” a story about challenging the election.
